com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.internal

Class RetryUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.internal.RetryUtility

  • public class RetryUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Used internally. A utility class to manage retries for various retryable service errors in the Azure DocumentDB database service. It invokes a delegate function to execute the target operation. Upon error, it waits a period of time as defined by the RetryPolicy instance before re-issuing the same request. Different RetryPolicy implementations decides the wait period based on its own logic.

    • Method Detail

      • executeDocumentClientRequest

        public static DocumentServiceResponse executeDocumentClientRequest(RetryRequestDelegate delegate,
                                                                   DocumentClient documentClient,
                                                                   EndpointManager globalEndpointManager,
                                                                   DocumentServiceRequest request)
                                                            throws DocumentClientException
        Executes the code block in the delegate and retry if needed.

        This method is used to retry an existing DocumentServiceRequest.

        Parameters:
        delegate - the delegate to execute.
        documentClient - the DocumentClient instance.
        globalEndpointManager - the EndpointManager instance.
        request - the request parameter for the execution.
        Returns:
        the DocumentServiceResponse instance
        Throws:
        DocumentClientException - the original exception if retry is not applicable.

      • executeCreateDocument

        public static ResourceResponse<Document> executeCreateDocument(RetryCreateDocumentDelegate delegate,
                                                               ClientCollectionCache clientCollectionCache,
                                                               java.lang.String resourcePath)
                                                        throws DocumentClientException
        Executes the code block in the delegate and retry if needed.

        This method is used to retry a document create operation for partitioned collection in the case where the request failed because the collection has changed.

        Parameters:
        delegate - the delegate to execute.
        clientCollectionCache - the cache the maps collection ResourceId or resource name to collection
        resourcePath - the path to the collection resource.
        Returns:
        the response resource.
        Throws:
        DocumentClientException - the original exception if retry is not applicable.
